data.title: Blue Mash Golf Course
data.meta_description: Summer Junior Golf Clinics for those looking for a summer camp for juniors. 4 person clinics with one instructor per clinic
data.text:
Juniors Play Free after 5PM

Monday-Thursday: Book your tee time online.

Friday-Sunday: walk-on basis only and/or space available.

*adults must pay rack rate – complimentary round available to kids 14 years and under

2024 Summer Junior Golf Clinics

Register for Camp

Submit Payment via our Online Store and pay from the comfort of your own home. If you’d prefer to pay in person please feel free to stop by.

At Blue Mash we group your child according to skill and age for maximum enjoyment. We maximize on course play, and don’t overwhelm the young golfers with too much instruction. Often, a group of three or four young golfers will play the course with one of our instructors, with the junior playing a “scramble” format to try and beat the instructor.

What you’ll learn:

Beginners are introduced to games designed to teach swing fundamentals in a fun way. As their confidence builds, they are later introduced to course play.

Highlights:

More on-course experience than other junior golf instruction opportunities.

Practicing full swing shots on our All Grass Driving Range.

Our curriculum focuses on developing golf skills (full swing, short game, rules, and etiquette) while keeping the experience fun and engaging (games and activities).

A fun, safe, and educational environment designed with your child’s well-being in mind.

Low student-to-instructor ratio (approximately 6:1)

Half-Day Clinics:

4 Days – $349

Full-Day Clinics:

4 Days – $499

Weekly Jr. Rental Sets By Child’s Height – If your child does not have a set of clubs to use, don’t sweat it, as we have you covered. Save big by renting a set from us for the week instead of buying a set that they might grow out of in a years time. We do require that every student to have their own sets of clubs. If you don’t own a set of clubs please select the appropriate set to rent for the week. Clubs must be reserved at least 2 weeks in advance of your child’s clinic date to guarantee a set will be available for them. If you have a set of clubs that your child has grown out of contact us to see if we can purchase them from you.

46″ ~ 52″ ($30/week)

53″ ~ 59″ ($35/week)

60″ ~ 65″ ($40/week)

66″ & Up ($45/week)

Week 1 : June 10 – 13

Week 2 : June 17 – 20

Week 3 : June 24 – 27

Week 4 : NO CAMP

Week 5 : July 8 – 11

Week 6 : July 15 – 18

Week 7 : July 22 – 25

Week 8 : July 29 – August 1

Week 9 : August 5 – 8

Week 10 : August 12 – 15

Week 11 : August 19 – 22

Register for Camp
